code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{FileUpload}from'./components/FileUpload';import{CpuChart}from'./components/CpuChart';import{HeapAllocChart}from'./components/HeapAllocChart';import{ThreadTable}from'./components/ThreadTable';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[data,setData]=useState([]);const[selectedTimeRange,setSelectedTimeRange]=useState();const handleDataParsed=parsedData=>{setData(parsedData);setSelectedTimeRange(undefined);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"min-h-screen bg-gray-50",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"max-w-7xl mx-auto py-6 sm:px-6 lg:px-8",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"px-4 py-6 sm:px-0",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-8",children:"JVM Thread Snapshot Visualizer"}),data.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FileUpload,{onDataParsed:handleDataParsed}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"space-y-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bg-white shadow rounded-lg p-6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CpuChart,{data:data})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bg-white shadow rounded-lg p-6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HeapAllocChart,{data:data})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bg-white shadow rounded-lg p-6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ThreadTable,{data:data,selectedTimeRange:selectedTimeRange})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex justify-end",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setData([]),className:"px-4 py-2 border border-transparent text-sm font-medium rounded-md text-white bg-indigo-600 hover:bg-indigo-700 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-indigo-500",children:"Upload New File"})})]})]})})});};export default App;
